index.title: Hotspot or not?
index.headline: Am I in a Covid-19 Hotspot?
index.subHeadline: Use the RKI data to check whether you are in a Covid-19 Hotspot.

result.noDataHeadline: Unfortuntaly, the RKI does not have any data for this location.
result.errorHeadline: Unfortunately, an error occurred while fetching data from the RKI

local.headline: Specific measures for {{area}}
local.linkDescription: Use the following link to find the rules in place for {{area}}.

generalLocal.headline: Specific measures
generalLocal.description: Measures may vary depending on state (Bundesland) and district (Landkreis). Because they often change, please find useful links below.

general.headline: General measures
general.description: Die following measures were decided on a federal level. Keep in mind that they can be different for your state and area.

masksMedium.title: Wear a mask
masksMedium.description: Everywhere in public areas where people have closer contact.

partiesMedium.title: Private gatherings
partiesMedium.description: A maximum of 25 people are allowed in public areas, 15 from max. two different households at home.

masksHigh.title: Wear a mask
masksHigh.description: Everywhere in public areas where people have closer contact. Individual extension may apply.

partiesHigh.title: Private gatherings
partiesHigh.description: A maximum of 10 people is permitted in public areas, 10 people from max. two different households may gather indoors.

curfew.title: Curfew for restaurants and bars
curfew.description: Curfew starting at 11pm. Also, the sale of alcohol is prohibited.

contactRestrictions.title: Contact restrictions
contactRestrictions.description: A maximum of 10 people are allowed in public areas. If additional measures do not have an effect, they can be further extended to max. 5 people or two households.

footer.credits: Made by Sebastian, Julian and Jonas
